Ğ§Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ñ‚ÑƒÑ‚ Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ. Ğ›ÑƒÑ‡ÑˆĞ°Ñ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ² ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ñ‘Ğ¼ Ğ¶Ğ°Ğ½Ñ€Ğµ!

This game is a masterpiece.
The story is great.
The hidden story is great.
The gameplay is great.
The puzzles are great.

Everything is great.

One of the best games I have ever played, with a great coop mode

Some pros of this game:
*Fantastic Single Player story.
*Lots of user created levels to play. (Both SP and coop)
*Great music and sound effects.
*Extremely fun and satisfying to play.
*Game still looks fantastic to this day

Cons:
*Can really make screaming matches and blame games going on when playing coop. (Has happened to me)

-I can strongly recommend this game for everyone!

It's a classic game with a still working community.
It combines thinking with physics and (a little bit of) action and is a good game to teach new players, how to play ego-shooters.

I give it 10/10 for it's amazing gameplay

=====
Graphics 9/10
Sound 10/10
Controll 10/10
Story 9/10
Characters 11/10 (no, this isn't a mistake)
Tried playing with my girlfriend but the levels got too hard for her lol. Really fun game though.
Fun puzzles and mechanics along with clever writing and a good story which doesn't overstay its welcome. What's not to like?

Este es un juegaso... una secuencias de puzles que debe realizar nuestra protagonista para alcanzar su propia libertad, la historia es muy buena, buenos guiones, chistes del juego y tal, niveles fÃ¡ciles y niveles que te hacen pensar. Su modo cooperativo es extraordinariamente dinÃ¡mico, ya que es necesario usar las dos cabezas para pensar y hace que trabajemos en equipo, sincronizando los usos de los portales, calculando cuando ponerlos y cuando quitarlos etc. Para jugar el modo cooperativo solo necesitas que tu compaÃ±ero sea igual de genio que tu... sino se torna aburrido y cansador.
RECOMENDADO AL 100%!

An amazing classic which you must play. The graphics are meh, but that doesn't matter at all because the story and gameplay are amazing. The game made me realize we're gonna need insurance in case of damage caused by Artificial Intelligence pretty soon.
So amazing and fun!

why do i do this to myself

Took me a long time to beat it because unlike the first game that was brilliantly paced, this one feels like it tries to fill out the gameplay with more story than the actual puzzle mechanic evolution allowed for. Some puzzle rooms feel pointless and redundant but it is just a minor gripe in what is otherwise an excellent game with amazing humor. Had it been anything other than a puzzle game I would not even have noticed, but the quest to make sequels longer just because can be felt... But since it adds more science themed humor Iâ€™m all for it.

mission impossible and this game would beg to differ.

This is a great game with good graphics it's very fun and it has a good story.
I love that you can build  your own Test Chambers and even try to play other 
peoples Test Chambers witch is really fun and there is even Co-op mode witch
you can play online or with a friend using a wireless controller.

I do have some complacence but its not about the game I have bean playing this game
on a MacBook (13-inch, Aluminum, Late 2008) its specs are 2 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
and 2 GB 1067 MHz DDR3 witch is required it only get like 3-9 fps witch is almost 
un playable I turned down the graphics as far down as they would go but it still only
2-12 fps.

Excelente juego, obra maestra, crack, idolo, es todo lo que diria al juego, es fantÃ¡stico los puzzles, la historia no decepciona y hay un modo coop que es fantÃ¡stico, ademas que tenga workshop para jugar los mapas con tu amigo o solo. Es genial, Steam le pego en el clavo a este juego.

It is a good game. It looks good even in 2019. Gameplay is awesome and i like the story. Although the replayability is low, i replayed it a few times just cause i liked the story and the jokes. I recommend to everyone.
